Text: On air traffic, work on the Airport Improvement Project Phase II Extension is in progress at the Banjul International Airport, and will last for eighteen months. The project is expected to boost handling capacity to five hundred thousand (500,000) passengers per annum.
Cause: On air traffic, work on the Airport Improvement Project Phase II Extension is in progress at the Banjul International Airport, and will last for eighteen months.
Effect: The project is expected to boost handling capacity to five hundred thousand (500,000) passengers per annum.
Sentence: <e1>On air traffic, work on the Airport Improvement Project Phase II Extension is in progress at the Banjul International Airport, and will last for eighteen months.</e1> <e2>The project is expected to boost handling capacity to five hundred thousand (500,000) passengers per annum.</e2>
